definition: thigh/part of a whole/portion of a sum/(stock) share/strand of a thread/low-level administrative unit, translated as "section" or "department" etc, ranked below 科[ke1]/classifier for long winding things like ropes, rivers etc/classifier for smoke, smells etc: thread, puff, whiff/classifier for bands of people, gangs etc/classifier for sudden forceful actions

sentences.english: In the recent rebound in prices, junk stocks is surging.
sentences.chinese: 在近期的反弹行情中，垃圾股走势可谓风起云涌。

sentences.english: The investor was bamboozled to buy junk bond.
sentences.chinese: 这个股民被忽悠，买了垃圾股。

sentences.english: The investor are bamboozled to buy the junk bond.
sentences.chinese: 这个股民被忽悠，买了垃圾股。

sentences.english: The investor was bamboozled into buying junk bond .
sentences.chinese: 这个股民被忽悠，买了垃圾股。

sentences.english: The investor was hoodwinked into buying junk stocks.
sentences.chinese: 这个股民被忽悠，买了垃圾股。

sentences.english: Don't you know you only put a sell on a dog?'
sentences.chinese: 难道你不知道你只能将垃圾股评为卖出？

definition: market price/quotation of market price/the current market situation
